articles.description: Manchester United, Tottenham and Rangers all have something at stake on what promises to be a thrilling final day of the Europa League league phase.
articles.title: Europa League final day: Who is through and what's at stake?

articles.description: Members of the United States figure skating community were on board an aeroplane that crashed near Washington DC, the country's governing organisation for the sport says.
articles.title: Washington plane crash: American figure skaters were on plane that crashed into Potomac River

articles.description: Steven Gerrard leaves his role as manager of Saudi Pro League side Al-Ettifaq after 18 months in charge.
articles.title: Steven Gerrard leaves Saudi Arabia's Al-Ettifaq after 18 month in charge

articles.description: Ireland interim head coach Simon Easterby retains Sam Prendergast at fly-half for Ireland's opening Six Nations match against England on Saturday.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Sam Prendergast starts at fly-half for Ireland against England

articles.description: Edinburgh hooker Dave Cherry is given a surprise start as Stafford McDowall replaces injured captain Sione Tuipulotu at inside centre for Scotland's opening Six Nations match against Italy on Saturday.
articles.title: Cherry and McDowall start for Scotland against Italy

articles.description: Manchester United make an offer to sign England forward Chloe Kelly from rivals Manchester City.
articles.title: Chloe Kelly: Man Utd make offer to Man City for England forward

articles.description: Chelsea agree late deal for England international Keira Walsh to join on the Women's Super League's transfer deadline day.
articles.title: Keira Walsh: Chelsea agree late deal with Barcelona for England midfielder

articles.description: Leg-spinner Alana King channels her hero Shane Warne to bewilder England's batters again on day one of the Test match in Melbourne.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: 'Warne-esque' Alana King shines at MCG

articles.description: Usman Khawaja's maiden double century and a hundred on debut from Josh Inglis give Australia complete control of the first Test against Sri Lanka in Galle.
articles.title: Sri Lanka v Australia: Usman Khawaja and Josh Inglis star in Galle

articles.description: A reported £65m deal for Aston Villa striker Jhon Duran to join Saudi Arabian club Al-Nassr is close to being completed.
articles.title: Jhon Duran close to completing Al-Nassr move from Aston Villa
